headline: Is Halliburton (HAL) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Strength?
summary: If you are wondering whether Halliburton's current share price still offers value, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. Halliburton shares last closed at US$33.84, with returns of 1.3% over the past 7 days, 9.8% over 30 days, 14.3% year to date, 36.8% over 1 year, and 90.6% over 5 years, while the 3 year return sits at a 3.8% decline. Recent price moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in energy services companies and how they fit into...

headline: Halliburton (HAL) Valuation Check After Q4 Earnings Beat And 2026 Growth Outlook
summary: Halliburton (HAL) is back in focus after its Q4 2025 earnings topped analyst expectations on revenue and adjusted EPS. Management highlighted 2026 plans centered on new technology and shareholder returns. See our latest analysis for Halliburton. Halliburton’s Q4 beat, recent nuclear waste disposal collaboration, and Singapore tech lab launch have come alongside a 9.76% 1 month share price return and 36.76% 1 year total shareholder return. However, 3 year total shareholder return remains...

headline: Core Laboratories Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Expenses Increase Y/Y
summary: CLB expects revenues to range from $124 million to $130 million and earnings per share to be between 11 cents and 15 cents for the first quarter of 2026.
